name: The Roommate
description:
The Roommate

By Jennifer Unkle

This is my first entry for Ludum Dare,  and my first published game. Writing a branching story in less than 48 hours was more difficult than I expected, but the way Twine visualizes paths was a massive help. I hope you enjoy it!

Twitter: @jbu3

Website: www.scanlinemedia.com
